briefdescription.para: Get the node identifier for the controller phandle from a "clocks" phandle-array property at an index.

simplesect.para: a node identifier for the clocks controller at index 0 in "clocks"

briefdescription.para: Get the node identifier for the controller phandle from a clocks phandle-array property by name.
Get a clock specifier's cell value at an index.

parameterdescription.para: node identifier for a node with a clocks property

briefdescription.para: Get the node identifier for the controller phandle from a "clocks" phandle-array property at an index.

simplesect.para: the node identifier for the clock controller referenced at index "idx"
a node identifier for the clocks controller at index 0 in "clocks"

briefdescription.para: Get the node identifier for the controller phandle from a clocks phandle-array property by name.

parameterdescription.para: lowercase-and-underscores name of a clocks element as defined by the node's clock-names property

simplesect.para: the node identifier for the clock controller referenced by the named element

briefdescription.para: Get a DT_DRV_COMPAT instance's clock specifier's cell value at an index.
Get a DT_DRV_COMPAT instance's clock specifier's cell value by name.

parameterdescription.para: lowercase-and-underscores name of a clocks element as defined by the node's clock-names property

simplesect.para: the cell value in the specifier at the named element
the value of the cell inside the specifier at index 0

briefdescription.para: Clocks Devicetree macro public API header file.
